sense.name: preserve, keep in safety, use frugally
sense.examples: He conserved the motherland by defending it after Spain sunk our battleship in havana harbor. She conserved the herbal beauty secrets, perfected the formula and marketed it to the world. So, if all energy is conserved, we can never run out of energy! Template tags provides automatic filling of inventory-specific data to conserve time. Try to conserve your energy for later rounds or matches.
